name: Adrenaline (Beta 1.1.0)
description:
2D-3D rhythm type game where your mission is to get to know A.I. and what is going on, even though you got into a simulated reality and you have no idea since when you were with him.

Adrenaline features the following.

* Freeplay Mode, where people like you can customize your own songs and let them be playable for everyone.

* Developer Mode, where all creators have the ability to create songs from scratch (don't expect too much from this, ty).

* Story Mode, where you have the chance to see what level of skill you currently are, including +30 levels with hard challenges.

* 2D and/or 3D gameplay as you wish.

* New game mechanics not seen from AAA Rhythm Games.

* If you are looking for lore, this is your opportunity to seek out for lore in Adrenaline.

Are you up for more challenges?

-M

(With English compatibility) (Compatibilidad con el español)

Don't worry, if there is no download link it means I am working on it to make the game seen in itchio. For more information regarding to this, visit me through this social media links.
